# INCreateNoteIntentResponse

**Class**

Your app’s response to a request to create a note.

## Declaration

```swift
class INCreateNoteIntentResponse
```

## Overview

Use an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateNoteIntentResponse] object to return information about the note that your app created. Siri communicates the information from your app’s response to the user at appropriate times.

You create an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateNoteIntentResponse] object in the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateNoteIntentHandling/confirm(intent:completion:)] and [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateNoteIntentHandling/handle(intent:completion:)] methods of your handler object. For more information about implementing your handler object, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INCreateNoteIntentHandling].

## Initializing the Response Object

- **init(code:userActivity:)**: Initializes the response object with the specified code and user activity object.

## Getting the Response Code

- **code**: The code indicating whether you successfully handled the intent.
- **INCreateNoteIntentResponseCode**: Constants indicating the state of the response.

## Accessing the Note Content

- **createdNote**: The details of the note that you created.

## Note Creation

- **INCreateNoteIntentHandling**: The handler interface for creating notes.
- **INCreateNoteIntent**: A request to create a new note.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResponse

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
